paper_abstract: In this paper, based on the Steane's enlargement construction, three classes of non-binary quantum codes are constructed from classical repeated-root cyclic codes of length 2p(s) over F-q with odd characteristic p. The exact minimum distances of these quantum codes are determined. This construction yields a quantum MDS code with parameters [[2p, 2p - 4, 3]](p) and two good quantum codes with parameters [[2p, 2p - 7, 4]](p) and [[2p, 2p - 10, 5]](p).
paper_title: On non-binary quantum repeated-root cyclic codes
